content:
@Johan Commelin, @Bhavik Mehta, I've pushed #6308, which is an attempt at the normalized Moore complex of a simplicial object (in any abelian category).

It exercises both the recent PRs about subobjects, and the PRs about connective chain complexes.
Awesome! Now we just need to make complexes work :thinking:
Yeah, I think I'm going to try the "two variable" approach next.
